commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basbdb09ae"

diff:
"bdb09ae bug 391740: make header in richlistbox appear on top/left instead of bottom/right of richlistitems; Patch by Michael Ventnor; r=mano; a=bzbarsky
diff --git a/toolkit/content/widgets/richlistbox.xml b/toolkit/content/widgets/richlistbox.xml
index 75a4f4a..4c9d474 100644
--- a/toolkit/content/widgets/richlistbox.xml
+++ b/toolkit/content/widgets/richlistbox.xml
@@ -50,7 +50,7 @@
     </resources>
 
     <content>
-      <children includes="listheader"/>
+      <children includes="xul:listheader"/>
       <xul:scrollbox allowevents="true" orient="vertical" anonid="main-box"
                      flex="1" style="overflow: auto;">
         <children/>
"
